detail_desc: 5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in washed stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Thin metal chain necklaces with coin-shaped pendants. Adjustable length 40-47 cm and 49-56 cm.
Knee-high football socks in fine-knit fast-drying functional yarn with elastication at the top, ankle and foot for best fit. Double layer underneath for extra cushioning.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an intarsia-knit front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in woven fabric with elastication at the back and wide jersey ribbing at the waist for a more comfortable fit. Side pockets, tapered legs and a detachable tie belt.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a shirt collar in woven fabric and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shoulder bag in imitation leather with a zip at the top, detachable shoulder strap with a carabiner hook at each end and an outer compartment with a press-stud. Lined.
Fabric patch with embroidered text. Size approx. 5x3.5 cm.
Court shoes with pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Non-wired lace bra with moulded cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined swimsuit with a low-cut back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. High-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Sports trousers in fast-drying fabric with an elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams, tapered legs and reflective details.

Short, wide-fitting jacket in cotton twill with appliqués, a stand-up collar, concealed zip and concealed press-studs. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, flap side pockets with a concealed press-stud and a drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. No buttons.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and reversible sequins on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dress with a lace bodice and chiffon skirt. Round neckline, short cap sleeves, a zip at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
V-neck satin top with a lace trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps. Unlined.
Pull-on trousers in soft cotton, one pair in a weave and one pair in corduroy. Elastication at the waist and hems, and fake pockets. Jersey lining.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt, zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide top in soft, printed jersey with short, wide dolman sleeves and a rounded hem.
Clamdiggers in soft, airy cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button. Front pockets, flap back pockets and shaping seams at the knees.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and raw-edge sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with embroidery on one leg, an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, double, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.
Short chiffon dress with an opening with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with a frill at the end, and a seam with smocking at the waist. Lined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless top in jersey crêpe with a double-layered stand-up collar with a gathered seam at the front and a small opening with buttons at the back of the neck.
Tube scarf in soft thermal fleece.

Lightly padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets, elastication at the cuffs and reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Skinny-fit dungarees in washed, stretch denim with adjustable straps, a high waist, zip in one side, chest pocket, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Blouse in a viscose weave with a button placket and a lace yoke at the front. Long sleeves with gathered seams at the shoulders and narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a V-neck front and back and 3/4-length sleeves.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Short blouse in an airy, patterned organic linen weave with peak lapels and a classic front with covered buttons. Short sleeves with contrasting patterned cuffs and a smocked detail at the sides of the hem to create volume. Sewn-on tie belt in a contrasting pattern at the hem that fastens at the front.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Two elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back and elastic at the hem. Medium support.
Long dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front, wide tie at the waist and short, double-layered sleeves. Unlined.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Double-layered hat with a turned-up hem.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.
Short, fitted dress in stretch denim with a square neckline, covered elastication over the shoulders and short puff sleeves. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with short, puff sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. 3/4-length leggings with an elasticated waist and scalloped hems.
Cap in woven fabric with an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and a seam at the waist.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Set with a dress and tights. Flared, long-sleeved dress in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a frill trim on the shoulders and a soft brushed inside. Fine-knit, cotton-blend tights with an elasticated waist.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck and buttons at the top.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Long dress in an airy weave with a shaped neckline, concealed zip at the back and gathered yoke front and back. Wide 3/4-length sleeves with flounces, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Partly lined.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Playsuit in an airy, printed viscose weave with flutter sleeves and a square neckline. Buttons down the front and a seam with concealed elastication at the waist.
Trainers with lacing at the front, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in sturdy organic cotton jersey with elastication at the back of the waist and straps with adjustable buttoning. Concealed press-studs at the crotch (except in sizes 1-4Y) and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Hi-tops in imitation suede with a fold-down edge and tongue covered in faux fur. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the top and elasticated lacing at the front. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Hi-tops with a padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a sequined motif on the front. Long sleeves, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
V-neck top in woven fabric with short, flounced sleeves.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with pattern-knit stripes, a button placket and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Kangol x H&M. The classic Kangol hat in soft faux shearling with an embroidered logo on the front. Cotton lining.

Short dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and long sleeves. Opening at the back with a concealed zip at the bottom and a concealed button at the back of the neck, a gathered seam at the waist and a fitted skirt.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Trainers in fabric and imitation leather with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Maxi dress in airy, tiered chiffon with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Long, double-breasted cardigan in bouclé yarn containing some mohair. Notch lapels, front pockets, sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs and ribbing at the hem.
Pull-on jeans in stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly, front pockets with a small frill trim and back pockets. Loose fit with gently tapered legs and elasticated hems.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with gathered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined patterned bikini. Top with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Bottoms with a decorative bow at the sides.
Short-sleeved top in airy jersey with a decorative seam at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey. Short sleeves with striped, ribbed trims.
Fitted jumpsuit in patterned velour with a V-neck front and back and a faux fur-trimmed tail. Unlined.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless, fitted top in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with a shaped neckline front and back.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset,wide sides and string back.
Tie in a striped weave. Width approx. 6 cm.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, lightly padded cups, a frill at the front and along the shoulder straps, and an adjustable metal hook fastening.
